about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: Which of these vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks?

about.name: Which of these vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks?

hasPart.assesses: Which of these vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks? | Which of these vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Trucks transporting hazardous loads must stop before they cross railroad tracks.

suggestedAnswer.text: Tank trucks marked with hazardous materials placards.

comment.text: Tank trucks marked with hazardous materials placards.

suggestedAnswer.text: Motor homes or pickup trucks towing a boat trailer.

comment.text: Motor homes or pickup trucks towing a boat trailer.

suggestedAnswer.text: Any vehicle with three or more axles and weighing more than 4,000 pounds.

comment.text: Any vehicle with three or more axles and weighing more than 4,000 pounds.

acceptedAnswer.text: Tank trucks marked with hazardous materials placards.

comment.text: Tank trucks marked with hazardous materials placards.

answerExplanation.text: Trucks transporting hazardous loads must stop before they cross railroad tracks.

comment.text: Which of these vehicles must always stop before crossing railroad tracks? | Trucks transporting hazardous loads must stop before they cross railroad tracks.

hasPart.name: You may cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle if the yellow line next to:

hasPart.assesses: You may cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle if the yellow line next to: | You may cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle if the yellow line next to: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Double yellow lines in the center of the road indicate that you may pass if a broken line is next to your driving lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: The other side of the road is a solid line.

comment.text: The other side of the road is a solid line.

suggestedAnswer.text: Your side of the road is a broken line.

comment.text: Your side of the road is a broken line.

suggestedAnswer.text: The other side of the road is a broken line.

comment.text: The other side of the road is a broken line.

acceptedAnswer.text: Your side of the road is a broken line.

comment.text: Your side of the road is a broken line.

answerExplanation.text: Double yellow lines in the center of the road indicate that you may pass if a broken line is next to your driving lane.

comment.text: You may cross a double yellow line to pass another vehicle if the yellow line next to: | Double yellow lines in the center of the road indicate that you may pass if a broken line is next to your driving lane.

hasPart.name: If you encounter an aggressive driver, you should:

about.name: If you encounter an aggressive driver, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If you encounter an aggressive driver, you should: | If you encounter an aggressive driver, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Drivers must respect and cooperate with all other road users and conform to specific rules in order to maintain order and to avoid crashes. When encountering an aggressive driver, it is safest to just get out of their way. Always avoid competing with other drivers.

comment.text: Challenge them.
Get out of their way.
Speed up.
Get out of their way.

answerExplanation.text: Drivers must respect and cooperate with all other road users and conform to specific rules in order to maintain order and to avoid crashes. When encountering an aggressive driver, it is safest to just get out of their way. Always avoid competing with other drivers.

comment.text: If you encounter an aggressive driver, you should: | Drivers must respect and cooperate with all other road users and conform to specific rules in order to maintain order and to avoid crashes. When encountering an aggressive driver, it is safest to just get out of their way. Always avoid competing with other drivers.

hasPart.name: Water on the road can cause a vehicle to hydroplane. Your car may hydroplane at speeds as low as:

about.name: Water on the road can cause a vehicle to hydroplane. Your car may hydroplane at speeds as low as:

hasPart.assesses: Water on the road can cause a vehicle to hydroplane. Your car may hydroplane at speeds as low as: | Water on the road can cause a vehicle to hydroplane. Your car may hydroplane at speeds as low as: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Hydroplaning occurs when there is standing water on a roadway. At speeds up to 35 mph, most tires will channel water away from the tire. As your speed increases past 35 mph, tires cannot channel the water as well and your tires may start to lose contact with the road and ride over the water like a set of water skis.

comment.text: 45 miles per hour.
35 miles per hour.
40 miles per hour.
35 miles per hour.

answerExplanation.text: Hydroplaning occurs when there is standing water on a roadway. At speeds up to 35 mph, most tires will channel water away from the tire. As your speed increases past 35 mph, tires cannot channel the water as well and your tires may start to lose contact with the road and ride over the water like a set of water skis.

comment.text: Water on the road can cause a vehicle to hydroplane. Your car may hydroplane at speeds as low as: | Hydroplaning occurs when there is standing water on a roadway. At speeds up to 35 mph, most tires will channel water away from the tire. As your speed increases past 35 mph, tires cannot channel the water as well and your tires may start to lose contact with the road and ride over the water like a set of water skis.

hasPart.text: This sign is posted on one-way streets and other roadways where a driver is not allowed to enter. A driver may see this sign if attempting to enter an expressway ramp in the wrong direction.

comment.text: Do not enter.
Yield the right-of-way.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reserved parking for persons with disabilities.

comment.text: Reserved parking for persons with disabilities.
Do not enter.

answerExplanation.text: This sign is posted on one-way streets and other roadways where a driver is not allowed to enter. A driver may see this sign if attempting to enter an expressway ramp in the wrong direction.
